entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then a few flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
